name: Wine and Song
r1: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 8% ATK increase and 3% Movement SPD increase.
r2: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 10% ATK increase and 3.5% Movement SPD increase.
r3: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 12% ATK increase and 4% Movement SPD increase.
r4: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 14% ATK increase and 4.5% Movement SPD increase.
r5: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 16% ATK increase and 5% Movement SPD increase.
